wikipedia_page.main: Michael Hasted (born 1945) is a British artist, writer, and director for the theatre and photographer.

response: *Idle Race (September 1969) (UK Only) Sleeve by Michael Hasted

334 is a science fiction novel by American author Thomas M. Disch, written in 1972. It is a dystopian look at everyday life in New York City around the year 2025. The dust cover design for the first edition was by Michael Hasted.
*Michael Hasted (born 1945), British artist, photographer, writer and theatre director
